mapper.insert: insert into collectinfo(collect_id , user_id, author_id, article_id) values(#{collect_id} ,#{user_id} ,#{author_id} ,#{article_id})
mapper.delete: delete from collectinfo where collect_id = #{collect_id} and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from collectinfo where collect_create_time > (select collect_read_time from notifiinfo where user_id = #{user_id} ) and author_id = #{user_id}
select * from collectinfo where user_id = #{user_id} order by -collect_id asc limit #{start},#{pagesize}
select count(collect_id) from collectinfo where user_id = #{user_id} ,author_id = #{user_id}, article_id = #{user_id}
